member.name: T:Tizen.System.Information
member.summary: The Information class provides functions to obtain various system information.

member.name: M:Tizen.System.Information.TryGetValue``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Gets the value of the feature.
member.param: The value of the given feature.
member.returns: Returns true on success, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Tizen.System.Information.SetCallback(System.String,System.EventHandler{Tizen.System.RuntimeFeatureStatusChangedEventArgs})
member.summary: Registers a change event callback for given runtime feature key.
member.remarks: This function is only for runtime feature.
member.param: The name of runtime feature which wants to register callback.
member.exception: Thrown when the is invalid.
Thrown when the feature related is not supported.

member.name: M:Tizen.System.Information.UnsetCallback(System.String,System.EventHandler{Tizen.System.RuntimeFeatureStatusChangedEventArgs})
member.summary: Unregisters a change event callback for given runtime feature key.
member.remarks: This function is only for runtime feature.
member.param: The name of runtime feature which wants to unregister callback.
member.exception: Thrown when the is invalid.
Thrown when the feature related is not supported.

member.name: T:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey
member.summary: Enumeration for the runtime information key.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.Bluetooth
member.summary: Indicates whether Bluetooth is enabled.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.WifiHotspot
member.summary: Indicates whether Wi-Fi hotspot is enabled.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.BluetoothTethering
member.summary: Indicates whether Bluetooth tethering is enabled.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.UsbTethering
member.summary: Indicates whether USB tethering is enabled.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.PacketData
member.summary: Indicates whether packet data through 3G network is enabled.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.DataRoaming
member.summary: Indicates whether data roaming is enabled.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.Vibration
member.summary: Indicates whether vibration is enabled.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.AudioJack
member.summary: Indicates whether audio jack is connected.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.Gps
member.summary: Indicates the current status of GPS.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.BatteryIsCharging
member.summary: Indicates whether the battery is currently charging.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.TvOut
member.summary: Indicates whether TV out is connected.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.AudioJackConnector
member.summary: Indicates change in the audio jack connector type.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.Charger
member.summary: Indicates whether the charger is connected.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey.AutoRotation
member.summary: Indicates whether auto rotation is enabled.

member.name: T:Tizen.System.GpsStatus
member.summary: Enumeration for the GPS status.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.GpsStatus.Disabled
member.summary: The GPS is disabled.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.GpsStatus.Searching
member.summary: The GPS is searching for satellites.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.GpsStatus.Connected
member.summary: The GPS connection is established.

member.name: T:Tizen.System.AudioJackConnectionType
member.summary: Enumeration for the type of audio jack connected.

member.summary: The audio jack is not connected.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.AudioJackConnectionType.ThreeWireConnected
member.summary: The 3-conductor wire is connected.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.AudioJackConnectionType.FourWireConnected
member.summary: The 4-conductor wire is connected.

member.name: T:Tizen.System.RuntimeFeatureStatusChangedEventArgs
member.summary: RuntimeFeatureStatusChangedEventArgs is an extended EventArgs class. This class contains event arguments for runtime event listeners.

member.name: P:Tizen.System.RuntimeFeatureStatusChangedEventArgs.Key
member.summary: The key indicating the runtime system preference which was changed. It includes the prefix "http://" though you don't use for registering callback.

member.name: M:Tizen.System.RuntimeInfo.Is``1(Tizen.System.RuntimeInfoKey)
member.summary: Validates the data type of the status represented by the runtime key. Note that this is a generic method.
member.param: The runtime information key for which the status type is validated.
member.returns: True if the data type matches.
member.exception: Thrown when the is invalid.

The value of the given feature.
member.returns: Returns true on success, otherwise false.

member.name: T:Tizen.System.SystemInfo
member.summary: The SystemInfo class provides static system feature. Please use Tizen.System.Information class. Information class supports same function.

member.summary: Checks if the type of value for the given feature is T.
member.typeparam: Type of value for the feature key.
member.returns: True if type of value for the given feature is T, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Tizen.System.SystemInfo.IsValidKey(System.String)

member.returns: True if the key is valid, otherwise false.

member.summary: Gets the amount of time this process has been scheduled in kernel mode.
